column5: This listing is for ENTIRE HOME. (Sleeps 6) Cozy, CLEAN, Private guest house. Private entrance and access to backyard, patio, and playground on property.  We live in the main house on the property so we are near should guests need anything.   15 - min from IAH Airport 20 min to The Woodlands area and Mall  25-30 Min to Downtown Houston Nearby gas stations, restaurants and stores.
column8: Great for Groups or Families, 15mins from IAH
